creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: section of handscroll mounted as a hanging scroll; deity seated on lotus pedestal on a white horse; three attendants in colorful robes behind, with clasped hands; female attendant in green near horse's head, and another attendant direction horse lower C; man in front of horse standing with outstretched, clasped hands; inscriptions in ink
medium: Ink and light color on paper
title: Memyō Bosatsu
